name: Willowcode
tag_list: offshore-software-development, software-engineering, outsourcing-ukraine, outsourcing-eastern-europe, ukrainian-outsourcing-company, dedicated-it-development-team, java, python, iphone, mysql
overview:
Willowcode is software engineering outsourcing company based in Kiev, Ukraine.

The company is experinced in developing entrprise-level applications (ERP, ECM) as well as web sites (eCommerce, social networking, etc.).

Willowcode provides creating project teams of excellent Java/Python/Frontend/Test engineers, local management, quality control, accurate time reporting and a collaboration with other development & test teams.

Willowcode team is strong in Spring/Hibernate stack, Python/Django development, MySQL and Postgres, including support of large production databases (20+ M of records). They use agile methodologies in their development lifecycle.
